data.name: Swarm
data.description: A deadly member of the Sinister Six, Swarm exists as a sentient hive of killer bees controlled by one evil mind.

starItems.name: Swarm
starItems.description: A deadly member of the Sinister Six, Swarm exists as a sentient hive of killer bees controlled by one evil mind.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain on each attack
If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to self

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain on each attack
If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to self

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Always Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary target
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to self

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to secondary attack
Bonus Attack an additional time for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>
If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to self

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, this attack will also have the additional effects, without losing an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, of this character's Ultimate - Bee Gone, targeting the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, this attack will also have the additional effects, without losing an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, of this character's Ultimate - Bee Gone, targeting the primary target.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies
If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, +<color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to self

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies
If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, +<color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to self

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade: This attack will also have the additional effects, without losing an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, of this character's Special - Bee Scream, targeting the primary target

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack self for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage.

This attack will also have the additional effects, without losing an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, of this character's Special - Bee Scream, targeting the primary target.

1.nextUpgrade: On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>4</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect
Gain +<color=#86e619>3%</color> Dodge Chance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>4</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect.

Gain +<color=#86e619>3%</color> Dodge Chance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>4</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>3%</color> Dodge Chance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>4</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>3%</color> Dodge Chance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
